name: BE//01 FirstLight (Includes Sound)
description:
FIRST LIGHT - Fragment One
From the BINARY EMOTIONS series)

"When the first light fell upon the circles of my eyes, I became so silent and calm. It was my life that began, feeling transformed by the desire to be known completely."

FirstLight: It's dedicated to the emotions of wanting to be someone. The culmination of ideas that push you through the never ending loop of infinite possibilities is all revealed as you witness the calm yet chaotic Firstlight tear through darkness and exist boldly, making nothingness seem irrelevant.

Firstlight is the piece that gave birth to “Binary Emotions and shall always remain the closest to me(the artist) in this series.
--
"BINARY EMOTIONS" | #BE is a series of 12 Animated Single Editions in which the artist aims to translate his inner nuances within a specific moment into visuals that evoke certain emotions. An emotional journey digitized into a binary piece cataloged onto the blockchain.
